description: Creation of 6 window openings at first floor level on the rear (north) and side (east) facing elevations; addition of 4 rooflights
subdivision_of_building: Rear of the buildings elevation on the first floor and the roof
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan, Location & Site Plans 20016-GAA-ZZ-00-DR-T-0101 P01 , Site Plan JDD/HAS-01, Existing Ground Floor Plan JDD/HAS-02, Existing First Floor Plan JDD/HAS-03, Existing Second Floor Plan JDD/HAS-04, Existing Front Elevation JDD/HAS-05, Existing Rear Elevation JDD/HAS-06, Existing East Side Elevation JDD/HAS-08, Existing West Side Elevation JDD/HAS-09, Proposed Ground Floor Plan 20016-GAA-ZZ-00-DR-T-2031 C01, Proposed First Floor Plan 20016-GAA-ZZ-01-DR-T-2032 C01, Proposed Roof Plan 20016-GAA-ZZ-RF-DR-T-2034 C01, Proposed Second Floor Plan 20016-GAA-ZZ-02-DR-T-2033 C01,  Proposed Front Elevation 20016-GAA-ZZ-XX-DR-T-2131 C01, Proposed Section AA 20016-GAA-ZZ-ZZ-DR-T-2231 C01, Proposed Side Elevation 20016-GAA-ZZ-XX-DR-T-2134 C01, Proposed Side Elevation 20016-GAA-ZZ-XX-DR-T-2133 C01, Proposed Rear Elevation 20016-GAA-ZZ-XX-DR-T-2132 C01, Design and Access Statement dated 19.02.2025, Heritage Assessment dated 19.02.2025.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
